_original_extraction.features: Topps back with cartoon/quiz and pitching record table; position P.
_original_extraction.notes: Back text: 'Steve went from the Yankees to the Indians in big trade, April 1974'; best season in majors was 1972 when he was 15-9 with 2.06 ERA.
